Name: In the Dark
About the game: 'In the Dark' is a roguelike deck-building horror card game. Collect cards, skills, items, and souls, and use them to survive. The world was shrouded in darkness due to the impact of the meteorite, monsters have appeared, and corpses have turned into zombies. The only way to survive is to move on. Select one of three places. You can cooperate with and fight against other survivors. Whenever you enter safe areas alone, ghosts will appear. In addition... A horde of zombies is a formidable foe. Defeating a boss monster, you can choose to end the play or continue. You should consider your free time and achievements.
